**Title:** Flooring Replacement at CBSA North Portal Traveler Building

**Reference Number**: WS4075682474

**Publication Date**: August 15, 2023

**Closing Date**: August 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Tender Status**: Cancelled

**Procurement Category:** *CNST

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The [Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)](https://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/home-accueil-eng.html) has invited tender for the North Portal Traveler Building Flooring Replacement, located at the Saskatchewan Port of Entry. The project involves replacing approximately 428 square meters of flooring with new carpet, porcelain floor tile, sheet flooring, and rubber base in a portion of the CBSA North Portal, Saskatchewan Port of Entry Travellers Building and Commercial Building.

The border crossing operates 24 hours per day, seven days a week, requiring phasing and temporary furniture relocation to maintain full operations with minimal disruptions during flooring replacement. This is a key consideration for potential bidders.

Submissions must be made electronically through the Buyandsell or Ariba platforms. A purchase agreement will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

**Disclaimer**
The above tender announcement is publicly available and accessible to all.
